solution_line_template: The second machine made {multiplier} times as many necklaces as the first machine, so the second machine made {multiplier} * {first_machine_necklaces} = <<{multiplier}*{first_machine_necklaces}={second_machine_necklaces}>>{second_machine_necklaces} necklaces on Sunday.
In total, {first_machine_necklaces} + {second_machine_necklaces} = <<{first_machine_necklaces}+{second_machine_necklaces}={total_necklaces}>>{total_necklaces} necklaces were made on Sunday.
